summary: Frontend-only testing for Industries page at /industries. All 13 test features passed - page renders correctly with 6 sections, expandable industry cards, animated stat counters, glass-morphism effects, particle animations, and framer-motion scroll effects.

issues: Canvas2D console warning about 'willReadFrequently' from tsparticles - minor performance optimization, non-blocking

context_for_next_testing_agent: Industries page at /industries fully functional with: Hero section with word-by-word animation, Section 1 (Specialisation) with 5 challenge cards, Section 2 (Industries) with 8 expandable industry cards in 2-column grid, Section 3 (Cross-Sector) with 7 functional area cards, Section 4 (Global/Local) with animated stat counters (30+, 18+), Section 5 (Expertise) with 5 consultant strength cards, Section 6 (Final CTA) with two buttons. Dark/light alternating pattern verified. Particle animations on dark sections (4 canvases). Glass-morphism on cards (9 dark, 17 light). 57 elements with framer-motion transforms.

tested_features.page_renders_at_industries: PASS - Industries page loads at /industries without console errors
tested_features.hero_section: PASS - Displays 'Industry-Aligned Talent Solutions.' headline, section label 'Sector Expertise. Talent Precision.', subtext, two CTA buttons (data-testid: industries-consultation-btn, industries-explore-btn)
tested_features.section1_specialisation: PASS - Shows 5 challenge cards with icons in two-column layout (data-testid: specialisation-section, challenge-0 through challenge-4)
tested_features.section2_industries_served: PASS - Shows 8 industry cards in 2-column grid (data-testid: industries-served, industry-card-{id})
tested_features.section2_expandable_cards: PASS - Cards expand on click showing roles list and industry insight, collapse on second click
tested_features.section3_cross_sector: PASS - Shows 7 functional area cards in grid layout (data-testid: cross-sector, functional-area-0 through functional-area-6)
tested_features.section4_global_insight: PASS - Shows animated stat counters for '30+' and '18+' with labels 'Countries Served' and 'Years of Industry Experience' (data-testid: global-insight)
tested_features.section5_expertise: PASS - Shows 5 consultant strength cards (data-testid: expertise-section, strength-0 through strength-4)
tested_features.section6_final_cta: PASS - Shows headline, text, two CTA buttons (data-testid: industries-final-cta, final-industries-consultation-btn, final-industries-explore-btn)
tested_features.navbar_footer: PASS - Navbar and Footer render correctly with all links
tested_features.data_testid_attributes: PASS - All 7 sections have proper data-testid attributes
tested_features.dark_light_alternating_pattern: PASS - Verified: hero(dark), specialisation(light), industries-served(dark), cross-sector(light), global-insight(dark), expertise(light), final-cta(dark)
tested_features.glass_morphism_effects: PASS - 9 glass-card-dark, 17 glass-card-light elements with backdrop-filter blur
tested_features.framer_motion_animations: PASS - 57 elements with transform styles, scroll animations trigger correctly

modals_tested.consultation_modal: Opens correctly with Full Name, Email, Company, Phone, Service Interest, Preferred Date, Message fields and Book Consultation button
